attributes.action: Scrap tax paid on work related Bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employees work hard throughout the year to earn financial bonuses. This hard work is what makes the country work and helps the economy grow. It is unfair that the financial bonus for this hard work is taken off of us. It makes a demoralised working society that does not want to work for the money because they know that half of it will be taken off them
